game.name: Portal Of Doom Undead Rising
game.description:
Some evil creatures have been attacked the space station that is a very important entity of your country. You have got a distress call from the authority to reach to the space station and fix out the problem. This place is reserved for making experiments. The problem is that you do not have any idea what has actually made things wrong there. Do you think that you can dare to accept this challenge right now? Join Portal of Doom: Undead Rising and get ready to face your fears and explore the place to know what has happened!

This challenge is very big as the space station might have a horde of monsters and mysteries to sort out. But, you also do not need to be scared at all as you are also lashed with plenty of advanced weapons that are enough to deal with any uninvited threat on your way in this intense sci-fi horror game. Do not forget to look into the clues and remain vigilant and keep your eyes on every aspect that can help to reveal the secret of the Portal of Doom. Kill all the monsters and spot survivors in this 3D first-person action game! 

Your objective in this one of the best html5 shooting games is to spot keys to open the locked doors, and solve the mystery surrounded by the space station. It will be also your responsibility of getting out of this hell alive. This 3D first-person sci-fi horror game features multiple high-tech weapons to use, horrendous monsters including aliens, spiders and zombie-like creatures, as well as high-quality graphics. Complete all the missions and become a champion of this free zombie game that does not ask you to download app or software!
